name: N.O.V.A. 2
summary:
The sci-fi shooter is back! Get ready to take your gaming experience to a whole new level on your device!

Six years have passed since the events of the first episode.
Humanity has become embroiled in a bloody civil war between the central government of the Orbital Satellites and the self-proclaimed Alliance of Humans and Aliens - a new organization with a mysterious agenda and origin. Kal Warden left the NOVA forces many years ago and now lives with other colonists on the planet Scorpius.
But war has invaded even this peaceful place...
Better, faster, stronger!
- New enemies with new and improved tactics, even better implemented thanks to the gyroscope
- Various weapons and power-ups
- More varied gameplay: run, shoot, fall, ride a motorcycle, fly a huge plane or shoot a laser
- The game has become even more exciting - it can be played by 10 players on 10 multiplayer maps
- Build a career and improve your position in the tournament table
- Unlock new locations with amazing graphics, fully optimized for the Retina screen
- Have you played the first NOVA - Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance? Then additional bonuses await you.

6 years have passed since the events of the first episode.
Humanity has become embroiled in a bloody civil war between the central government of the Orbital Satellites and the self-proclaimed Alliance of people and aliens - a new organization with a mysterious program and origin. Kal Warden left the NOVA troops many years ago and now lives with other colonists on the planet Scorpius.
But the war has invaded even this peaceful place...

An unrivaled single-player campaign:
- 12 chapters that will take you through the inhospitable, but amazingly beautiful places on Orbit
- A variety of weapons, including a dual pistol, assault rifle, shotgun, automatic shotgun, sniper rifle, launcher, grenade launcher, alien plasma gun, flamethrower and alien laser rifle, turrets, frag grenades, mines
- 3 special abilities that will help break through the defense: Freeze and Disc for melee attacks
- A large number of different enemies, for a more intense game
